attributes.long-description:
Air Conflicts: Vietnam is an arcade-styled air-combat game that immerses players in the harrowing skies over Vietnam. Take to the air in screaming fighter jets or grab the controls of devastating helicopter gunships as you shatter enemy encampments with explosive ordinance, decimate North Vietnamese fighter squadrons, and deliver troops to the ever-changing front lines of the vicious battlefield.
KEY FEATURES
Live a thrilling wartime narrative. In an epic campaign, filled with heroic moments and the darker side of war
Jump into the cockpit for instant action. Pilot and customize more than 20 planes and – for the first time in the Air Conflict series – helicopters
Lead your squadron to victory. Command up to four jets or helicopters, maximizing their unique abilities to complete challenging objectives
Challenge your friends for air supremacy. Play up to 8 online opponents in nail-biting air battles.
Treat your ears to a cool rock soundtrack in the style of vintage Vietnam-era tunes.

PS3™ system software v3.60 or higher, HD 3D display with compatible 3D active glasses and highspeed HDMI cable (sold separately) required for 3D features.  Visit www.us.playstation.com/support/3D for details.



1 player
146KB minimum save size
SIXAXIS Motion Sensitive
HDTV screen resolution: 720p
DUALSHOCK®3
Network Features
Network Players 2-8
Stereoscopic 3D compatible
PlayStation®Eye camera optional
PlayStation®Move motion controller and PlayStation®Eye camera optional
PlayStation®Move navigation controller or Wireless Controller optional.

This item is being licensed or sublicensed to you by Sony Computer Entertainment America and is subject to the Network Terms of Service and User Agreement, this item’s use restrictions and other applicable terms located at www.us.playstation.com/support/useragreements. If you do not wish to accept all these terms, do not download this item. This item may be used with up to 2 activated PlayStation®3 systems associated with this Sony Entertainment Network account. 

PlayStation®Move features require PlayStation®Move motion controller and PlayStation®Eye (sold separately).
